com.eaglesakura.material.widget.support

Class SupportPopupWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eaglesakura.material.widget.support.SupportPopupWindow

  • public class SupportPopupWindow
extends Object
    Android 5.1以下と6.0以上の挙動を適度に合わせるためのPopupWindow Wrapper
